extracted_playbook.title: Update PowerFlex 755 Software
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the updated version of PowerFlex 755 software, v20.3.407, provided by Rockwell Automation to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement suggested security best practices for industrial automation control systems as recommended by Rockwell Automation.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet by minimizing network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls and Network Isolation
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures as recommended by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets as provided by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA guidelines for more information on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
